meta.title: About SwipeScout | Our Mission and Team
meta.description: Learn about SwipeScout's mission to modernize hiring with video-first profiles and AI-driven matching.
meta.keywords: SwipeScout, video resume, recruitment, hiring, AI matching
meta.ogDescription: See how SwipeScout helps candidates and employers find better matches through video profiles and AI.

hero.title: About SwipeScout
hero.subtitle: Revolutionizing the way people find jobs and companies find talent
hero.description: Founded in 2025, SwipeScout connects candidates and employers through short, authentic video profiles and smart matching.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: To make job searching as engaging and effective as social networking.
mission.description2: We believe video profiles let candidates showcase personality and communication alongside skills.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Passionate professionals dedicated to transforming recruitment.
